body:
Comment 4: 
I have no idea how to run your test case.  I installed bzr and scons
but have no idea how to get the scons go tools.  Also I'd rather 
debug the performance problem than deal with build tools.

Can you please post a goray.tgz file such that

tar xzf goray.tgz
cd goray
make 

builds and runs the performance regression,
without dependence on any external packages
or tools?

Thanks.
